lead_paragraph: Amid financial and safety concerns, the Boys & Girls Club of Marshall, Tex., voted to end its tackle program; the club will expand its popular flag football program.

headline.print_headline: Youth Club Is Ending Tackle Program
headline.main: Youth Tackle Program Is Being Eliminated in a Football Hotbed

snippet: Amid financial and safety concerns, the Boys & Girls Club of Marshall, Tex., voted to end its tackle program; the club will expand its popular flag football program.
abstract: Football Roundup; Boys & Girls Club in Marshall, Tex, substitutes its tackle football program with its flag football program because of long-term dangers associated with sport; other football news noted.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Boys and Girls Clubs of America
